admin.title: Admin Dashboard

photoLimit.title: Update Photo Limit
photoLimit.description: Set the maximum number of photos each user can upload to this session.

qrCode.title: Session QR Code
qrCode.description: Share this QR code for guests to upload photos to your session.

alerts.downloadUnauthorized: You can only download photos from your own sessions.

alerts.copyFailed: Failed to copy link. Please try manually.
alerts.qrCodeLoadFailed: Failed to load QR code. Please try again.
alerts.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this session? This action cannot be undone.
alerts.deleteError: Error deleting session. Please try again.

photos.title: Photos
